title: Dodgers' Shohei Ohtani Posts Photo with Wife Mamiko Tanaka After Announcing Marriage | Flipboard
text: Dodgers' Shohei Ohtani Posts Photo with Wife Mamiko Tanaka After Announcing Marriage Los Angeles Dodgers designated hitter Shohei Ohtani shared a rare glimpse into his personal life Thursday. Ohtani shared a photo on his Instagram Story with his wife, basketball player Mamiko Tanaka, according to Fox Sports. The two are headed to the 2024 Seoul Series, where the Dodgers are set to … Related articles More stories from [Los Angeles Sports](/topic/losangelessports) [Dodgers Notes: Blockbuster Trade Shakes Up Seoul Series, NL West; Two Ailing Stars Will Be On Flight](/topic/losangelessports/dodgers-notes-blockbuster-trade-shakes-up-seoul-series-nl-west-two-ailing-sta/a-sJTpwmyJSqOh_9aSwrHERA%3Aa%3A3126271692-7e0196955c%2Fdodgersnation.com) The Dodgers’ traveling party and pitching plans for Thursday’s voyage to South Korea to kick off the 2024 regular season are looking set.
